action.action-desc: Mr. Rounds introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To eliminate the period of limitations for certain non-capital homicide offenses.

section.text: This Act may be cited as Kamisha's Law.

section.header: No period of limitations for certain non-capital homicide offenses

subsection.text: Chapter 213 of title 18, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, an indictment may be found or information may be instituted at any time without limitation forâ€”

murder in the second degree, voluntary manslaughter, or attempted manslaughter under section 1114;
